nodes.text: Darth Soverus was a male Sith Dark Lord of the Sith of the reconstituted Sith Empire and a member of the Emperor's Dark Council.

At some point in his lifetime, he came across the old Sith seer Spindrall, who predicted the circumstances surrounding his death. In the year 3637 BBY, as the only member of the Council present on the planet, Soverus was killed by a Republic strike team during the Korriban Incursion as foreseen, fighting to protect the Chambers from defilement.

Darth Soverus was an expert in lightsaber combat and used the Jar'Kai form in his fight against the Republic strike force in the Dark Council chamber on Korriban. He was also capable of telekinesis, including guiding a thrown lightsaber and Force choking.
Soverus first appeared during the flashpoint Korriban Incursion.
